message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.MM

The paper proposes a new method for decomposing matrices into components of multiple scales, which is motivated by practical applications where data matrices exhibit local correlations in multiple scales. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), information theory (cs.IT), numerical analysis (cs.NA), and multimedia (cs.MM). Among these, cs.LG and cs.CV are the most likely categories, as the paper focuses on developing a convex formulation for decomposing data matrices into multiscale low rank components and demonstrates the effectiveness of the proposed method in several applications related to image and video processing.
